metadata.name: File Download And Execution Via IEExec.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects execution of the IEExec utility to download and execute files

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\ieexec.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('ieexec.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('http://')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('https://'))))

output.summary: Detects execution of the IEExec utility to download and execute files
